code: import axios from"axios";import*as constants from'./constants';var changeDetail=function changeDetail(title,content){return{type:constants.CHANGE_DETAIL,title:title,content:content};};export var getDetail=function getDetail(id){return function(dispatch){axios.get('/api/detail.json?id='+id).then(function(res){var result=res.data.data;dispatch(changeDetail(result.title,result.content));}).catch(function(){alert('Failed to get content.');});};};
